titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: LAST DNA OR PATIENT CANCELLED DATE - Description

div.p: For the Elective Admission List Commissioning Data Set types, LAST DNA OR PATIENT CANCELLED DATE Â is derived from OFFERED FOR ADMISSION DATE and ADMISSION OFFER OUTCOME and is needed to meet central requirements. It is recorded when PATIENTS who have been offered a date for admission have missed this admission date with or without advance notice.
